model.metadata: CREATE VIEW countries ( Index biginteger(10) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'Index', NATIVE_TYPE 'biginteger', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Country string(4000) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'Country', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), "Month" string(4000) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"Month"', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), HarvestYear biginteger(10) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'HarvestYear', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), CONSTRAINT index_pk PRIMARY KEY(Index) ) AS SELECT A.Index, A.Country, A."Month", A.HarvestYear FROM (EXEC Countries.getTextFiles('data-100000-index.txt')) AS f, TEXTTABLE(f.file COLUMNS Index biginteger, Country string, "Month" string, HarvestYear biginteger HEADER) AS A;
